about.title: About MoodFM
about.content:
MoodFM is an AI-powered music recommender that transforms your emotions into the perfect song. Just type how you feel (in any language), then MoodFM analyzes your mood and finds a song that matches your emotional state.

It was built in under four weeks for the Summer of Making 2025, entirely self-hosted at home. MoodFM is stateless : no login, no ads, just music and emotion. ‚ú®

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.content:
After you enter your mood, the text is translated to English using the Google Translate API, so the models can understand it. It‚Äôs then analyzed with AI (via HuggingFace models) to ensure it's safe and to identify the emotional tone.

Based on that mood, a matching song is selected using Last.fm tags and then fetched from various music providers through different APIs.

Finally, you can share your personalized track with a unique link letting the vibe live on. üé∂
